name: Ch.10ABaseConvo1
_source: speak;Natasha;Yes, I am Natasha.|Is there something I can do for you?
speak;Amelia;Yes, my name is Amelia.|Princess Eirika informed me that you're from Grado too.
speak;Natasha;Oh!|You're from Grado too?!|Oh, how wonderful is it to have another woman from Grado here...
speak;Amelia;Yay!|Everyone here has been so kind so far, but it's nice to have someone from Grado!|What part of Grado are you from?
speak;Natasha;I'm from the monastery.|I'm a cleric from there.
speak;Amelia;I see!|No wonder you have such pretty robes!|I've been helped by a lot of clerics from there!
speak;Natasha;Oh thank you!|We worked so hard there to help the people...
speak;Amelia;We are so thankful for your service...
speak;Amelia;Oh!|I just had a wonderful idea!|Why don't I cook us up a Grado dinner!|A little taste of home!
speak;Natasha;Oh, that would be delightful!|I will help you cook as well!
